text: Summary Product: OpenCart Vendor: OpenCart Severity: High Affected Version(s): 4.0.0.0 -4.023 Tested Version(s): 40.22,402.3 CVE: CVE-2023-47444 CVE Description: In OpenCart versions 4.0.0.0 to 4.0.23, authenticated backend users having common/security “access" and "modify” privileges can write arbitrary untrusted data inside config.php and admin/config.php, resulting in remote code execution on the underlying server.
